attributes.action: set up a coalition government (or at least all parties work together) with regard to beating the recession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of all the parties wasting precious time and energy on scoring political points against each other - why not set up a coalition government (or at least all work together) so that all the best expertise can pull together; beat this recession and get the country back on its feet and help the people!  
Arguing between parties does not solve the problem - whereas all working together just might!
